definition: A person or entity that provides employment opportunities and is responsible for overseeing and managing the work of individuals or a group of employees. This term is commonly used to refer to the party who hires and supervises workers, typically in a professional or organizational context.

examples.german: Der Arbeitgeber bietet flexible Arbeitszeiten an.
examples.english: The employer offers flexible working hours.

examples.german: Mein neuer Arbeitgeber ist ein internationaler Konzern.
examples.english: My new employer is an international corporation.

examples.german: Der Arbeitgeber zahlt ein gutes Gehalt.
examples.english: The employer pays a good salary.

examples.german: Die Rechte der Arbeitnehmer werden vom Arbeitgeber respektiert.
examples.english: The rights of the employees are respected by the employer.
